data.meta_site_name: John Wright, Jr. Obituary | March 18, 2023 | Eric S. George Funeral Home - Miramar, FL
data.text:
John Wright Jr. was born June 28, 1954. He was the first of six children to Johnnie & Wright and Mary F. Wright (both deceased). He was born in Kingstree, SC. He received his education in Broward County Schools until the death of his mother.

John along with along with their second child Lee Roy Wright (deceased) were both born in South Carolina. Geneva Wright Wilson (James Wilson-Divorced) was born when the family relocated to Miami, FL. Juanita Wright (deceased), Jeffery Wright (deceased), and Ricky Wright (Kimberly Wright) were born when the family moved to Hollywood, FL.

In 1972, John enlisted in the Army. He served two years until his honorable discharge.

When leaving the service, John came back to Florida.

He departed this life peacefully on March 18, 2023. He leaves behind to cherish his memories: Three daughters: Kylie, Ortega Henry, and Ashley; a bonus daughter: Tonya Jules. 8 grandchildren and a special aunt Dorothy McClenden and a host of nieces, nephews, aunts, uncles, cousins and friends.

Please leave the family a note of condolence, light a candle of remembrance or order a floral remembrance piece.

Be comforted by these words:

Revelation 21:4 - He will wipe away every tear from their eyes, and death shall be no more, neither shall there be mourning, nor crying, nor pain anymore, for the former things have passed away.
